verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Alelu-uya alelu-uya
alelu-u-uya amen.
Alelu-ya, amen, alelu-
alelu-ya amen.
Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya
a-amen.
Alelu-u-uya amen.
Aleluya, amen,
alelu-u-uya amen). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Aleluya mshukuruni Bwana,
aleluya liitieni jina lake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wajulisheni watu
matendo yake,
mwimbieni Bwana
mwimbieni kwa zaburi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jisifuni kwa jina,
jina lake takatifu,
Utafuteni uso,
uso wake siku zote.

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Zikumbukeni ajabu zake
Bwana. Zikumbukeni ajabu
zake alizofanya. Kumbukeni

Miujiza na hukumu
za ki-nywa chake
Aleluya amen. x5
